text: Invitation to True Rewards
“Ho! Everyone thirsty, come to the waters!
And whoever has no money, come, buy and eat,
and come, buy without money,
wine and milk without price!
Why do you weigh out money for \add what is\add* not food,
and your labor for ⸤what cannot satisfy⸥?\f + \fr 55:2 \ft Literally “\fq what is \ft not for satiation” \f*
Listen carefully to me, and eat \add what is\add* good,
and let your soul take pleasure in ⸤rich⸥\f + \fr 55:2 \ft Literally “fatty” \f* food.
Extend your ear, and come to me!
Listen so that\f + \fr 55:3 \ft Or “and” \f* your soul may live,
and I will ⸤make⸥\f + \fr 55:3 \ft Literally “cut” \f* an everlasting covenant with\f + \fr 55:3 \ft or “for” \f* you,
the enduring proofs of ⸤the mercies shown to⸥\f + \fr 55:3 \ft Literally “mercy of” \f* David.
Look! I made\f + \fr 55:4 \ft Or “gave” \f* him a witness to \add the\add* peoples,
a leader and a commander \add for the\add* peoples.
Look! You shall call a nation \add that\add* you do not know,
and a nation \add that\add* does not know you shall run to you,
because of Yahweh your God,
and the holy one of Israel, for he has glorified you.”
Seek Yahweh ⸤while he lets himself be found⸥;\f + \fr 55:6 \ft Literally “in his letting himself be found” \f*
call him ⸤while he is⸥\f + \fr 55:6 \ft Literally “in his being” \f* near.
Let \add the\add* wicked forsake his way,
and \add the\add* man of sin his thoughts.
And let him return to Yahweh, that\f + \fr 55:7 \ft Or “and” \f* he may take pity on him,
and to our God, for he will ⸤forgive manifold⸥.\f + \fr 55:7 \ft Literally “make numerous to” \f*
“For my thoughts \add are\add* not your thoughts,
and your ways \add are\add* not my ways,”
⸤declares⸥\f + \fr 55:8 \ft Literally “declaration of” \f* Yahweh.
“For \add as\add* \add the\add* heavens are ⸤higher⸥\f + \fr 55:9 \ft Literally “high” \f* than \add the\add* earth,
so my ways are ⸤higher⸥\f + \fr 55:9 \ft Literally “high” \f* than your ways,
and my thoughts than your thoughts.
For just as the rain and the snow come down from heaven,
and they do not return there
except they have watered the earth thoroughly
and cause it to bring forth and sprout,
and give seed to the sower
and bread to the eater,
so shall be my word that goes out from my mouth.
It shall not return to me without success,
but shall accomplish\f + \fr 55:11 \ft Or “do” \f* what I desire
and be successful \add in the thing for\add* which I sent it.
For you shall go out in joy,
and you shall be led in peace.
The mountains and the hills shall break forth before you, rejoicing
and all the trees of the field shall clap hands.\f + \fr 55:12 \ft Hebrew “hand” \f*
Instead of the thorn bush, \add the\add* juniper shall go up;
instead of the brier, \add the\add* myrtle shall go up,
and it shall serve as a memorial to Yahweh,
for an everlasting sign \add that\add* shall not be cut off.”
